mapper.select: select email, gender, mno, nick, photo_path as photoPath, sano, status from member WHERE nick LIKE '%${nick}%'

select sender_mno as smno, receiver_mno as rmno, content, message_no as messageNo, nick as senderNick from message join member on message.sender_mno = member.mno where (sender_mno = #{smno} and receiver_mno = #{rmno}) or (sender_mno = #{rmno} and receiver_mno = #{smno}) order by message_no desc limit 5;

select sender_mno as smno, receiver_mno as rmno, content, message_no as messageNo, nick as senderNick from message join member on message.sender_mno = member.mno where (sender_mno = #{smno} and receiver_mno = #{rmno}) or (sender_mno = #{rmno} and receiver_mno = #{smno}) order by message_no desc limit #{messageNo}, 10;
